email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam. Could you provide us with a freight quote and available vessel options? We are aiming for a laycan period of November 15-20.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Alex Rodriguez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m, for your shipment. Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton on a CFR basis. The vessel is currently available and can meet your requested laycan period of November 15-20.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for the prompt response. The vessel details look good, but we were hoping for a more competitive rate given the volume of the shipment. Could you consider revising the quote to USD 24.00 per metric ton?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Alex Rodriguez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

After reviewing your request, we are pleased to offer a revised freight rate of USD 24.50 per metric ton. This rate reflects the high volume of your shipment and our commitment to providing competitive pricing.

Please confirm if this revised rate is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of USD 24.50 per metric ton. Could you please provide the demurrage terms and confirm the laycan period remains as November 15-20?

Looking forward to finalizing the details.

Best regards,
Alex Rodriguez

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Details for Iron Ore Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I can confirm the laycan period remains as November 15-20. The demurrage rate is set at USD 18,000 per day, applicable only if there is a delay beyond the agreed laydays.

If everything is in order, we can proceed with the necessary documentation to secure the vessel for your shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Iron Ore Shipment Agreement: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork to finalize the agreement.

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Best regards,
Alex Rodriguez
